annotate.m1: Cancel, Sign In, and create a new bookmark.
annotate.m2: You are not signed in. Bookmarks created when you are not signed in cannot be shared.
annotate.m3: Invalid link; invalid format, get link from bookmark popup.
annotate.m4: Invalid link; invalid format, get link from bookmark popup.
annotate.m8: A bookmark is already being added at paragraph
annotate.m10: Annotation is disabled when the bookmark navigator is active.
annotate.m11: Sign into your account to share this bookmark to FB by email or to copy a link.
annotate.m12: Unable to fetch bookmark topic list
annotate.m14: You must be signed in to share bookmarks.

bmlist.header: You Don't Have Any Bookmarks Yet
bmlist.intro: Bookmarks are expressive and powerful and you can assign them to categories to easily view only the categories you want. There are two ways to create bookmarks.
bmlist.item2: Clicking on the paragraph number, eg: (p21)
bmlist.link: See the Bookmark documentation for more information.

error.e1: Error saving annotation, please try again
error.e5: Sorry, there was a problem, refresh the page and try again.
error.e6: Don't include the paragraph number in your selection, please try again.
error.e7: Your selection is overlapping with another; overlapping is not supported.
error.e8: Please limit selected text to a single paragraph
error.e9: Please enter at least one email address.
error.e11: Unexpected number of data points in existing timing data, please inform Rick, Can't capture time until this is resolved.
